conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours make better decisions with their social media data. I came across your company while researching and noticed you're using Brandwatch. How's your experience been with them so far?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Honestly, it's been okay. We've had some issues with data accuracy and the cost is a bit steep for us. But it's been working for the most part. What makes DeepData AI different from Brandwatch?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question. Our AI-powered solution can process large amounts of data much faster and more accurately than traditional methods. We've seen companies like yours reduce their data processing time by up to 50%. And our pricing is very competitive, especially considering the value you get. We'd be happy to provide a customized demo to show you how it works.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure if now is the right time for us to be looking at new tools. We're in the middle of a big project and our budget is already allocated for the year. Plus, I'd need to run any new tool past our procurement team, and that can be a lengthy process.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand. We've worked with companies in similar situations before. We could offer a pilot program to test out our solution and see the value it can bring before making a larger commitment. And we've had experience integrating with procurement teams to make the process as smooth as possible. Would you be open to discussing this further with our integration team?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but I really don't think we'd be a good fit for DeepData AI right now. We're not just talking about integrating with one team, we have multiple stakeholders and systems that would need to be considered. And to be honest, I'm not the one who makes the final decisions on new tools or budget allocations. I'm just the CTO, and our CFO has been pretty strict about not approving any new expenditures this year.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand the challenges you're facing, and I appreciate your honesty. Is there anything I can provide to you that might make it easier to make a case to your CFO, or perhaps we could schedule a call with them to discuss further?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Thank you, Alex, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. I appreciate the time you've taken to speak with me, but I don't foresee our circumstances changing in the near future, and I don't want to waste your time or ours. Please don't contact us again about this.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Authority
Feedback: The seller should have attempted to involve or discuss with the buyer how to approach the CFO earlier in the conversation to potentially build a stronger case for DeepData AI. Sentiment: Neutral
